dc_title_s: Ipsos Canada RBC Housing Study, Winter 2007
dc_description_s: The Ipsos Canada Winter 2007 RBC Housing Study analyzes home ownership trends and behaviours in Canada. Participants to the survey reveal key information on current home ownership status and short-term intentions, mortgage financing, values of property, as well as understanding of mortgage insurance policies. This survey has a sample of 2,404 respondents. The study consists of microdata, statistical tables, reports, and presentations.
